entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TapGestureRecognizer Blocks User Interaction on Focusable Controls (Picker, Editor, SearchBar, DatePicker) #28123

Closed

  • Explicit Style in ContentPage Crashes on Android in Release Build Only #28120

Created

    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Don’t call NSAttributedString with HTML from a background thread #26153
    do-not-merge, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed Keyboard Scrolling in editors with Center or End VerticalTextAlignment #25827
    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5

    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JsonSerializerContext source generator ignores PropertyNamingPolicy #113045
  • c# program segfaults when ran under callgrind #113043
  • [API Proposal]: Obsolete attributes under S.R.CompilerServices with no effect #113042
  • [Native AOT] Initialize COM eagerly #113040
  • [Feature Proposal] AOT universal shared generics #113038

PullRequests

Created

  • Perform additional checks in `PEHeaders`. #113048
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Fix TensorPrimitives.MultiplyAddEstimate for integers #113047
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • [browser] avoid locks in ST interop #113046
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [SGen/Tarjan] Handle edge case with node heaviness changing due to deduplication #113044
    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • OSDescription.Android: Returns a user-friendly name instead of Linux kernel #113041
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, os-android, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add morphing to LE_UN/GT_UN(expr, uint.MaxValue) (dotnet#76525) #113037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 133.0.6943.141, windows: 134.0.6998.35 #113036
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Add benchmarks.run_pgo_optrepeat collection #112750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/RiscV64] Fix unwinding FSx registers #113039
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • [mono] Fix c&p error in MarshalingPInvokeScanner. #112983
    area-Interop-mono

Updated

  • Implement `ShuffleNative` methods and optimise `Shuffle` for non-constant `indices` #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use minipal_getcpufeatures to detect for AVX #113032
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use SSA-based ComputeRange in assertprop #112824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: enable inlining methods with EH #112998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support Telemetry Schema Url in tracing and metrics #113034
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 10.0.0
  • Fix an edge case in the Tarjan GC bridge that leads to losing xref information #112825
    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • Implement IEnumerator<T> on ref struct enumerators #106309
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser][st] event pipe #110818
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [browser] [wasm] Make response streaming opt-out #111680
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, os-browser
  • [mono] Fix detecting [DisableRuntimeMarshalling] in MarshalingPInvokeScanner. #112981
    area-Interop-mono
  • Bring back CLRTestTargetUnsupported to mcc build projects #112399
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize bit operations of BigInteger #113005
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Generalize multi-pass build support #2790
    Backlog

Updated

  • CanIgnoreTemplateGroupsWithConstraints flaky test failing in CI #46212
  • dotnet watch - Failure in DeleteSubfolder test with polling #46454
  • aspnetcore build failure - Child node 7 exited prematurely #46398
  • [dotnet watch] Cannot open project Lib.fsproj because extension fsproj is not associated with a language #46378
  • Unable to find directory for jdk 11.0.24; please make sure the tool is installed on this image. #45834
  • Build failure in VMR Vertical Build Windows_x64: Downloading vswhere - Process cannot access sdk.txt because it is being used by another process #45809
  • Workload Feature Band Test Sometimes Fails #45314
    10.0.1xx
  • Template engine tests hitting known parallelism issue in GetVisualStudioInstances #44878
    10.0.1xx
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
    10.0.1xx
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
    10.0.1xx
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    10.0.1xx
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
    10.0.1xx
  • Failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
    10.0.1xx
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
    10.0.1xx
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
    10.0.1xx
  • Question: How Can I Include a Native DLL in the Project? #12442

Updated

  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
